Define base asset(s) list that will be combined with quote asset(s) to make trading pairs list
Preset helps to reduce the number of available instruments and focus on a certain list of symbols

member.summary: Big or paranormal bar is a bar with a significant length several times bigger than average bar

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Enums.CandleType.Doji
member.summary: opens and closes at the same price with bi-directional price fluctuation

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Enums.CandleType.Gravestone
member.summary: open and close at the same price with upper price fluctuation

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Enums.CandleType.Dragonfly
member.summary: open and close at the same price with down price fluctuation

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Enums.CandleType.Whirligig
member.summary: High - Open = Close - Low or High - Close = Open - Low with short body

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Enums.CandleType.HangingMan
member.summary: ohlc.High == ohlc.Open and ohlc.Close - ohlc.Low > body * 2

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Enums.CandleType.InverseHammer
member.summary: ohlc.Low == ohlc.Open and ohlc.High - ohlc.Close > body * 2

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Enums.CandleType.ShootingStar
member.summary: ohlc.Low == ohlc.Close and ohlc.High - ohlc.Open > body * 2

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Enums.OrderCondition.BuyIfAskRise
member.summary: когда мы собираемся войти в рынок в long как только будет преодолена трендовая линия но текущая цена ниже чем та по которой мы хотим купить к примеру текущая цена 400$ а мы ждем пока преодолеем уровень 500$ и только тогда затариваемся в лонг

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Enums.OrderCondition.SellIfBidFall
member.summary: когда мы собираемся войти в рынок в short при падении ниже трендовой линии но текущая цена пока выше и не понятно будет ли дальнейшее снижение например: текущая цена 500$ а мы ждем падения ниже линии до 400$ только тогда открываем шорт

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.CoinHelper.Top
member.summary: BTC,ETH,BNB,XRP,TRX - i.e. symbols that might serve as quote asset in trading pairs

member.name: T:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.CoinLiteral
member.summary: Literals for wide quote filter e.g. USDT* means match either USDT/USDC/BUSD etc.

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.CoinLiteral.ANY
member.summary: * means any symbol is ok

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.CoinLiteral.ANY_USD_LIKE
member.summary: USD* means USD + USDT,USDC,BUSD,DAI etc.

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.CoinLiteral.ANY_TOP
member.summary: BTC* means BTC + ETH,BNB,TRX etc. i.e. any TOP symbol that might serve as a quote symbol in trading pairs

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.CoinLiteral.ANY_STABLE
member.summary: USDT* means USDT + USDC,BUSD,USDJ,USDD,TUSD,VAI,DAI etc. i.e. any stable or pegged coin

member.name: F:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.CoinLiteral.ANY_FIAT
member.summary: FIAT means USD,EUR,UAH etc.

member.name: M:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.SymbolFilterExtensions.Match(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: returns true if filter is that matches the symbol

member.name: M:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.SymbolFilterExtensions.Match(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: match symbol with symbols, if any match found returns true, otherwise false. support (i) normal symbols e.g. [`BTC_USDT`,`BTC_BUSD`] match `BTC_USDT` => true (ii) wide symbols with `*` placeholder: e.g. `*_USDT`, `ATOM_*` [`BTC_USDT`,`BTC_BUSD`] match `BTC_*` => true or [`BTC_USDT`,`BTC_BUSD`] match `*_USDT` => true [`BTC_*`,`*_BUSD`] match `BTC_USDT` => true (iii) coin literals e.g. `ATOM_USDT*`, `ATOM_FIAT`

member.name: M:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.SymbolFilterExtensions.Filter(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: filter symbols, the filter might be a concrete symbol(s) comma-separated or quote asset (e.g. BTC, USDT etc.) or wide quote assets
member.param: - `XXX` - a certain asset e.g. BTC, UAH etc. - `*` or `null` - return all - `USD*` - symbols with quote asset match either USD, USDT, BUSD, DAI etc. - `BTC*` - symbols with quote asset match currencies - `FIAT` - symbols with quote asset match currencies

member.name: M:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.IRankHelper.GetRank(System.Decimal,System.String)
member.summary: estimates trade total rank was it a micro trade or a large one the greater rank the larger the trade was

member.name: T:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.TradingPairHelper
member.summary: helps to generate trading pairs (aka symbols) combining quote and base currencies

member.name: M:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.TradingPairHelper.CombineAll(System.String[],System.String[])
member.summary: combines all quote assets with all base assets e.g. ["USDT","BUSD"] + ["BTC","XRP"] => ["BTC_USDT","BTC_BUSD", "XRP_USDT","XRP_BUSD"]

member.name: M:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.TradingPairHelper.CombineWithQuoteAssets(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: combines base asset with quote asset(s) e.g. "BTC" + ["USDT","BUSD"] => ["BTC_USDT","BTC_BUSD"]

member.name: M:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Helpers.TradingPairHelper.Combine(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: combine with e.g. USDT + [BTC,ETH,XRP] => [BTC_USDT, ETH_USDT, XRP_USDT]

member.summary: Gets the number of currencies in balance book

member.name: P:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Prices.PriceHelper.Prices
member.summary: these are indicative prices for purposes like ranking coins by value relative to other coins indicative means for example BTC is ~10 times bigger than ETH or ~100 times bigger than BCH, LTC etc.

member.name: T:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Symbols.SymbolDescriptor
member.summary: descriptors should help to classify coin-zoo

member.name: P:AVS.CoreLib.Trading.Symbols.SymbolDescriptor.Markets
member.summary: what exchanges have trading pairs with this symbol possible values - `*` - widely accepted listed on many exchanges e.g. LTC - `Binance+` - listed on Binance and other markets - `Binance!` - listed on Binance but not listed on other big markets usually new listings on Binance - `Gate` - listed on gate.io i.e. not listed on Binance - `DEX` - listed on DEX only
